mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MARKET_COMMENT ( MARKET_COMMENT_NO, MARKET_NO, USER_ID, MARKET_COMMENT_CONTENT, MARKET_COMMENT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MARKET_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{marketNo}, #{userId}, #{marketCommentContent}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT C.MARKET_COMMENT_NO AS marketCommentNo, C.MARKET_NO AS marketNo, C.USER_ID AS userId, C.MARKET_COMMENT_CONTENT AS marketCommentContent, C.MARKET_COMMENT_DATE AS marketCommentDate, U.USER_NAME AS userName FROM TB_MARKET_COMMENT C JOIN TB_USER U ON C.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE C.MARKET_NO = #{marketNo} ORDER BY C.MARKET_COMMENT_DATE DESC

SELECT MARKET_COMMENT_NO AS marketCommentNo, MARKET_NO AS marketNo, USER_ID AS userId, MARKET_COMMENT_CONTENT AS marketCommentContent, MARKET_COMMENT_DATE AS marketCommentDate FROM TB_MARKET_COMMENT WHERE MARKET_COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}
